title: Legal Eagles (1986)Robert Redford+Debra Winger (Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0091396/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0091396/</a>

With Daryl Hannah (then 26, two years after 'Splash')

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish.

Robert Redford, as the district attorney with a partner who put a dog at the witness stand, is seduced by his naked client Daryl Hannah, who cannot enter a room without a crime beging committed.

I could not find this film on any of the torrent sites, so I made a rip for you.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x304, good stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
